Package net.prsv.stimer

Class StylusViewAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<StylusViewAdapter.ViewHolder>
net.prsv.stimer.StylusViewAdapter
public class StylusViewAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<StylusViewAdapter.ViewHolder>
Implementation of RecyclerView.Adapter used by the Stylus Timer app.
